### Hey there üëã

Welcome! This is /Ààper.iÀàk…ô äd.kiz/. I got my [BEng in Computer Science](https://www.cse.ust.hk/ug/comp/) üéì in [HKUST](https://hkust.edu.hk/) üè´ and having working experience with [![Java](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Java-007396?style=flat&logo=Java&logoColor=white)](https://java.com/) for 2+ yearsüéâ.

I have been working with my current company for more than a year. My responsibility is to develop, design efficient APIs for OMS (Order Management System) using [![Java](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Java-007396?style=flat&logo=Java&logoColor=white)](https://java.com/), [![Spring](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Spring-6DB33F?style=flat&logo=Spring&logoColor=white)](https://java.com/), [![Hibernate](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Hibernate-59666C?style=flat&logo=Hibernate&logoColor=white)](https://hibernate.org/), [![MySQL](https://img.shields.io/badge/-MySQL-4479A1?style=flat&logo=MySQL&logoColor=white)](https://www.mysql.com/); to test code with [![JUnit](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Junit4-25A162?style=flat&logo=Junit4&logoColor=white)](https://junit.org/junit4/), [Mockito](https://site.mockito.org/). I have been successfully establishing and reinforcing the development cycle and [![git](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Git-F05032?style=flat&logo=Git&logoColor=white)](https://git-scm.com/) practices in my workplace, with the help of [![Jenkins](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Jenkins-D24939?style=flat&logo=Jenkins&logoColor=white)](https://www.jenkins.io/) for CI/CD.

Tech stacks: [![AWS](https://img.shields.io/badge/-AWS-232F3E?style=flat&logo=AmazonAWS&logoColor=white)](https://aws.amazon.com/) [![EC2](https://img.shields.io/badge/-EC2-FF9900?style=flat&logo=AmazonEC2&logoColor=white)](https://aws.amazon.com/ec2/) [![Lambda](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Lambda-FF9900?style=flat&logo=AWSLambda&logoColor=white)](https://aws.amazon.com/lambda/) [![RDS](https://img.shields.io/badge/-RDS-527FFF?style=flat&logo=AmazonRDS&logoColor=white)](https://aws.amazon.com/rds/) [![Jira](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Jira-0052CC?style=flat&logo=Jira&logoColor=white)](https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira) [![Bitbucket](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Bitbucket-0052CC?style=flat&logo=Bitbucket&logoColor=white)](https://www.atlassian.com/software/bitbucket) [![Confluence](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Confluence-172B4D?style=flat&logo=Confluence&logoColor=white)](https://www.atlassian.com/software/confluence) [![IntelliJ IDEA](https://img.shields.io/badge/-IntelliJ%20IDEA-000000?style=flat&logo=IntelliJIDEA&logoColor=white)](https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/)

During my internship when I was a uni student, I engaged in a system revamp for a government department and prototyped it at stage 1 of SA&D for some web UI using [![JavaScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/-JavaScript-F7DF1E?style=flat&logo=JavaScript&logoColor=black)](https://www.javascript.com/) & [![jQuery](https://img.shields.io/badge/-jQuery-0769AD?style=flat&logo=jQuery&logoColor=black)](https://jquery.com/). I also coordinated, initialized and prototyped the 1st mobile version of the revamp using [![Bootstrap](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Bootstrap%204-7952B3?style=flat&logo=Bootstrap&logoColor=white)](https://getbootstrap.com/) at stage 2 of SA&D and successfully delivered a satisfied result to Team Lead. üéä
